EmailTemplate.description: This email template is used to send email to super user when a reopen request for Work Order is submitted.
EmailTemplate.name: Work Order: Request to Reopen Work Order
EmailTemplate.subject: Request to Reopen Work Order {!SVMXC__Service_Order__c.Name} : {!SVMXC__Service_Order__c.SVMX_PS_Subject__c} : {!SVMXC__Service_Order__c.Case_Thread_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Super User,
{!User.Name} has requested that Work Order {!SVMXC__Service_Order__c.Name } be reopened.
{!User.Name} provided the following reason for the request:
Thank you.
